overview: Heading west for his health, Colonel Lambeth takes his daughter Rill along. Lost on the desert they are saved by Pecos and Chito. The Colonel hires the two and the Lambeths soon find themselves mixed up in Pecos' trouble. Pecos has killed Sawtelle's brother and Sawtelle as head of the vigilantes is after him.
tagline: OUTLAW LUCK RUNS OUT......when a girl meets men on even terms to blast a bandit band!
title: West of the Pecos
